== Description ==
Display the <tt>robots.txt</tt> file content.

The echoed content should be with usage of the permalinks or for creating the <tt>robots.txt</tt> file.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php do_robots() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
Accepts no parameters.

== Return Value ==
This function does not return any value.

== Examples ==
<!-- Need creative examples. Feel free to link to external examples. -->

== Notes ==
* Uses [[Function_Reference/do_action|do_action()]] Calls <tt>'do_robotstxt'</tt> hook for displaying <tt>robots.txt</tt> rules.
== Change Log ==
Since: 2.1.0

== Source File ==
<tt>do_robots()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/functions.php}}.
